description: Short online quizzes at the end of each module covering pathological processes and diseases. Multiple attempts allowed with highest score recorded.
1-hour invigilated test with multiple-choice and short-answer questions on content from weeks 1-3 including acute inflammation and pneumonia.
Creation of a patient information leaflet about a selected disease (500 words) with reflection (200 words) and peer evaluation. Requires scientific literature citation.
2-hour invigilated exam with multiple-choice questions and short-answer questions covering all course content including neoplasia and vascular diseases.
